sensitivity.label: Detection Sensitivity
sensitivity.help: Controls how aggressively prompt injection patterns are detected. 'high' may produce more false positives.

blockOnCritical.label: Block Critical Threats
blockOnCritical.help: Automatically block messages and tool calls that match critical-severity injection patterns.

scanIntervalMinutes.label: Background Scan Interval
scanIntervalMinutes.help: How often (in minutes) the background security scanner runs.

auditOnGatewayStart.label: Audit on Startup
auditOnGatewayStart.help: Run a full config and secrets audit when the gateway starts.
